channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Flytipping of laminate flooring, 29th September
item.description:
Resident "chloe" of the middle flat left as you look has thrown flooring from the window onto the grass area and has also dumped rubbish out onto the pavement area
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 17;19;21;23;25;27, Bramley Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain blocked again by mud, 29th September
item.description:
Albert Road near to the Pittville lake bridge is blocked by mud yet again. Nearest properties Lakeside at 82 Albert Road.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Albert Road, Marle Hill, Cheltenham

item.title: Pedestrian lights 2 and 4 the push button for wait are not working, 29th September
item.description:
Lights 2 and 4 push button not working on Morrisons side of the road just come back it is a danger to the public as school buses just dropping at this time of day Urgent response needed
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Caernarvon Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: The traffic light has been vandalised

item.title: St george flag on bridge, 29th September
item.description:
Thre is a st george flag on the bridge going over the under pass on the elmbridge court roundabout which needs removing due to the current political and contentious over tones that it brings
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Elmbridge, Gloucester
